segments.text: Why not ? What's wrong with it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sometimes it goes fast . And sometimes it goes slow . And the alarm doesn'twork , either .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . Can I have my money back ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hmm ... have you got a receipt ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . I must see your receipt . You can't have your money back without receipt .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I'm not certain , but I think I've lost it .
segments.speaker: S1
